channel.title: The Village Church - Sermon Audio
channel.itunes:author: Matt Chandler
channel.description: The Village Church exists to bring glory to God through lives changed by the gospel of Jesus Christ. We do this by (1) actively proclaiming the gospel in our community to those who do not believe, and by (2) actively pursuing the ongoing renovation of our own lives through the grace of Christ. This podcast includes sermons from pastors Matt Chandler, Beau Hughes, Josh Patterson, and others. Visit The Village Church online at www.thevillagechurch.net.
channel.itunes:summary: The Village Church exists to bring glory to God through lives changed by the gospel of Jesus Christ. We do this by (1) actively proclaiming the gospel in our community to those who do not believe, and by (2) actively pursuing the ongoing renovation of our own lives through the grace of Christ. This podcast includes sermons from pastors Matt Chandler, Beau Hughes, Josh Patterson, and others. Visit The Village Church online at www.thevillagechurch.net.
